articles.author: Joe Mock
articles.title: How Rickwood Field was renovated for historic MLB game: 'We maintained the magic' - USA TODAY
articles.description: America's oldest ballpark needed significant upgrades to get ready for the historic MLB game at Rickwood Field.
articles.content:
The year was 1992, the 82nd anniversary of the opening of Rickwood Field. But there was no birthday celebration.
It had been five years since the Birmingham Barons of the Southern League had moved o… [+6374 chars]
